text: No #mRNA vaccine without lipids: #Evonik now produces the important component for the #COVID19 #vaccine from @biontech @pfizer in Germany. Dr. Thomas Riermeier, Head of Evonik Health Care, talks about the new production in a three-question interview. https://t.co/Vyp24Sbcbf https://t.co/h7eQ1Prj1u
